title: nIDUzhi vAzhga
sahitya:
nIDUzhi vAzhga vAzhgavE paramA nin parivum arivum tiruvum uravum


anupallavi

  ADum ain-tozhilALiyE nin anbum paNbum aruLum poruLum


caraNam    irukka iDamum ninaikka manamum iyaTra nalanum iyamba vAkkum urukka azhagin
iyarkkai vaLamum udavit-tanip-padavi tanda Om shuddha shakti jyOti guruvE
